description: Situated in the restored premises of the historic El Toulà restaurant, Alajmo Cortina is home to a bar on the ground floor, with the restaurant occupying the two upper floors (no lift). Although traditional in feel with a profusion of wood, the restaurant is run by a young and enthusiastic team. The cuisine focuses mainly on the region, although the menu also features fish and other imaginative options on tasting menus and an à la carte.
